#id=1
#text=I was looking in the mirror yesterday and noticed that my hair was too long , so I decided to get a haircut .
#id=2
#text=I called my regular salon to see if they were busy .
#id=3
#text=Luckily , they were not and I was told to come right in .
#id=4
#text=I drove to the salon and checked in with the receptionist at the front desk .
#id=5
#text=I was told to take a seat and that someone would be with me shortly .
#id=6
#text=I was only seated for a few minutes when the hairdresser said that she was ready for me .
#id=7
#text=She led me over to a chair and I sat down .
#id=8
#text=We discussed what I wanted to do with my hair , a trim , and then she took me to the shampoo area .
#id=9
#text=My hair was washed and conditioned and then I was led back to the hairdresser 's chair .
#text=She combed my hair out and then cut off the split ends a few small sections at a time .
#text=I saw little wisps of my hair fall onto the floor .
#text=When the hairdresser was finished cutting , she took out a blow dryer and dried my hair .
#text=I looked in the mirror and I was very pleased with my haircut .
#text=I walked back over to the receptionist and paid for the cut .
#text=I added about twenty percent as a tip to reward the hairdresser for doing a great job .
#text=I left the hair salon and drove home .
